类 TapNote

java.lang.Object
org.kelvinizer.note.Note
org.kelvinizer.note.TapNote
所有已实现的接口:
Comparable<Note>
public class TapNote extends Note
The TapNote class represents a tap note in the rhythm game. It extends the Note class and defines specific behavior for tap notes, such as judging the note, determining its activity and visibility, and providing visual feedback with rectangles and particles.

  • 字段概要

    从类继承的字段 org.kelvinizer.note.Note

  • 构造器详细资料

    • TapNote

      public TapNote(int lane_num, double perfect_hit_time, double duration)
      Constructs a TapNote object with the specified lane number, perfect hit time, and duration.
      参数:
      lane_num - The lane number where the tap note is located.
      perfect_hit_time - The perfect hit time for the note.
      duration - The duration for which the note is active.

  • 方法详细资料

    • parseTapNote

      public static TapNote parseTapNote(String s, double offset)
      Parses a tap note from a string representation.
      参数:
      s - The string containing the tap note data.
      offset - The offset to apply to the perfect hit time.
      返回:
      A new TapNote object created from the parsed data.

    • judge

      public void judge(int signal)
      Judges the note based on the given signal.
      指定者:
      judge 在类中 Note
      参数:
      signal - The signal used to judge the note. If the signal is 0, the note is marked as missed; if the signal is 1, the note is considered for a perfect, good, or bad hit.

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Checks if the note is currently active.
      指定者:
      isActive 在类中 Note
      返回:
      True if the note is active (i.e., it has not yet been judged as missed or hit), false otherwise.

    • hasRect

      public boolean hasRect()
      Determines whether the note has a rectangle representation.
      指定者:
      hasRect 在类中 Note
      返回:
      True if the note has a rectangle, false if it has a particle representation.

    • hasParticle

      public boolean hasParticle()
      Determines whether the note has a particle effect.
      指定者:
      hasParticle 在类中 Note
      返回:
      True if the note has a particle effect (i.e., it's been hit with a perfect, good, or bad status and is still within the lingering time), false otherwise.

    • visibilityStatus

      public int visibilityStatus()
      Determines the visibility status of the note.
      指定者:
      visibilityStatus 在类中 Note
      返回:
      An integer representing the visibility status of the note: 0 = the note is invisible, 1 = the note is visible, 2 = the note is no longer active and should be hidden.

    • toBottomRect

      public CRect toBottomRect()
      Creates a bottom rectangle for the TapNote with a specified fill color.
      指定者:
      toBottomRect 在类中 Note
      返回:
      A CRect representing the bottom of the TapNote, with a fill color of light blue.
